last_episode_to_air.name: A Portrait of Evil
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Annamaria Phelps and Daniel Lauer turn up dead in a lovers’ lane area close to the Colonial Parkway in northern Virginia, many in law enforcement are convinced that this fourth double homicide in three years proves the work of a serial killer.

name: Lovers' Lane Murders
overview: Chilling and eerie connect similarities to four brutal double murders between 1986-1990. Now, a team of former FBI special agents intends to bringing them to justice and providing answers to the victims' families.

episodes.name: No One Can Hear You Scream
episodes.overview: After Cathy Thomas and her girlfriend Becky Dowski are murdered, authorities are left to wonder if this is a hate crime or the birth of something more ominous.

episodes.name: Evil Strikes Again
episodes.overview: With Cathy Thomas and Becky Dowski’s Colonial Parkway homicide still unsolved, a new double murder less than a year later leaves law enforcement rattled. Are the slayings of David Knobling and Robin Edwards in another lovers’ lane area connected?

episodes.name: No Bodies, No Answers
episodes.overview: An entire region is on edge after college students Cassandra Hailey and Keith Call go missing from a lovers’ lane area in Northern Virginia. Is this third double homicide on the Colonial Parkway an unnerving coincidence or proof of a serial killer?

episodes.name: A Portrait of Evil
episodes.overview: When Annamaria Phelps and Daniel Lauer turn up dead in a lovers’ lane area close to the Colonial Parkway in northern Virginia, many in law enforcement are convinced that this fourth double homicide in three years proves the work of a serial killer.
